30A Songwriters Festival
Fri, Jan 12, 2024
6:00 PM
18:00
Sun, Jan 14, 2024
10:00 PM
22:00
Beach and Brew on 30A
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
The 30A Songwriters Festival brings together hundreds of artists, dozens of venues and resorts, and thousands of music fans to celebrate the art of songwriting along the beaches of Walton County, Florida. Come experience the premier songwriters festival in the country at our venue!  This is exclusively ticketed event. Arrive early. Limited seating.
Friday 06:00PM Jennifer Lynn Simpson & Megan Burtt
Friday 07:30PM Sara Jean Kelley & Caitlin Cannon
Friday 09:00PM The Rough & Tumble
Saturday 06:00PM Sara Hells & Clare Cunningham
Saturday 07:30PM Sammi Accola & Heather Mae
Saturday 09:00PM Uncle Dave Griffin & Webb Wilder
Sunday 06:00PM The Mosleys
Sunday 07:15PM Kurtis John & Casey Levasseur
Sunday 08:30PM Kyle Lamonica & Meaghan Farrell

13
to Jan 15
30A Song Writer's Festival
Fri, Jan 13, 2023
5:30 PM
17:30
Sun, Jan 15, 2023
9:30 PM
21:30
Beach and Brew on 30A
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Thrilled to be a “small venue” for Song Writers Festival 2023! The premier festival in the country celebrating 14 years of musical excellence. We are open to public until 5:00 PM every day, all weekend. After 5:00 PM, the taproom will be closed for ticketed patrons only. We do not serve food, just light snacks. Make sure to arrive early to get a seat, limited seating available.  *Schedule is subject to change.
Anna Shinholster, Cat Ridgeway
Fri, Jan 13 | 5:30 PM - 630 PM
Danielle Howle
Fri, Jan 13 | 6:45 PM - 7:45 PM
Tim Easton
Fri, Jan 13 | 8:00 PM - 9:00 PM
The Moseleys
Sat, Jan 14 | 5:30 PM - 6:30 PM
Casey LeVasseur, Kurtis John
Sat, Jan 14 | 6:45 PM - 7:45 PM
Brendan Abernathy, Diane Durrett
Sat, Jan 14 | 8:00 PM - 9:00 PM
Kyle LaMonica, Wyatt Edmondson
Sun, Jan 15 | 5:30 PM - 6:30 PM
Martha’s Trouble
Sun, Jan 15 | 6:45 PM - 7:45 PM
Andi Zack-Johnson, Michael Tolcher
Sun, Jan 15 | 8:00 PM - 9:00 PM
The Blue Eyed Bettys
Sun, Jan 15 | 9:00 PM - 10:00 PM
View Event →

5:30 PM
17:30
Sun, Jan 16, 2022
10:00 PM
22:00
Beach and Brew on 30A
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
The 30A Songwriters Festival has featured established touring acts in various genres as well as up and coming new singer songwriters! Four-day music filled weekend in indoor venues, all located along the 30A resort corridor on the Gulf of Mexico in Northwest Florida.
The event is closed to public. Tickets required for entry, you can purchase them
here
.
Friday January 14
Kyle Lamonica 5:30 PM
Michael Tolcher  5:30 PM
Cousin Curtiss 8:00 PM
Diane Durrett  8:00 PM
Jeff Black 9:15 PM

Paul Burch  6:45 PM

Leigh Nash 9:15 PM
Sunday January 16

Sarah Johnson 6:45 PM
Eliot Bronson 8:00 PM
Abe Partridge 8:00 PM

Join Sean for Trivia every Wednesday night!

Book a Private Event
Beach and Brew is a perfect place for an indoor/outdoor venue! For private events, we offer beer, wine, frozen drinks and an alcoholic drink of your choice! We will coordinate music and catering on your behalf. Each event comes with a day-of event coordinator to be onsite. Start a chat with us.
Contact: Beachandbrew30a@aol.com
Book a Private Event
Beach and Brew is a perfect place for an indoor/outdoor venue! For private events, we offer beer, wine, frozen drinks and an alcoholic drink of your choice! We will coordinate music and catering on your behalf. Each event comes with a day-of event coordinator to be onsite. Start a chat with us.
Contact: Beachandbrew30a@aol.com

ICS
Thrilled to be a “small venue” for Song Writers Festival 2023! The premier festival in the country celebrating 14 years of musical excellence. We are open to public until 5:00 PM every day, all weekend. After 5:00 PM, the taproom will be closed for ticketed patrons only. We do not serve food, just light snacks. Make sure to arrive early to get a seat, limited seating available.  *Schedule is subject to change.
